data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Bhagalpur, Bihar, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhagalpur, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 33,416 believers in Bhagalpur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Bhagalpur, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help every believer in Bhagalpur, Bihar, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Bhagalpur.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Lohar Kamti people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Bhagalpur, Bihar, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Bhagalpur that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bhagalpur who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Bhagalpur
